## auth.DecodedIdToken.sub property

The `uid` corresponding to the user who the ID token belonged to.

As a convenience, this value is copied over to the \[`uid`<!-- -->\](\#uid) property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sub: string;
```
